TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignedInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type SignedInfo = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 包含有关用于 XML 签名的规范化算法和签名算法的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the canonicalization algorithm and signature algorithm used for the XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 <`SignedInfo`> 元素的 XML 数字签名规范所定义的 XML 签名。The class represents the <`SignedInfo`> element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. <`SignedInfo`> 元素，它是子元素的 <`Signature`> 元素，包含用于对签名进行签名和验证和参考资料描述了数字签名使用的算法的规范化方法。The <`SignedInfo`> element, which is a subelement of the <`Signature`> element, contains the canonicalization method used for signing, the algorithm used for signing and validation, and references that describe a digital signature. 大多数情况下，应使用类可从属性进行签名和验证 XML 数字签名。For most scenarios, you should use the class available from the property to sign and verify XML digital signatures. 有关详细信息 <`SignedInfo`> 元素，请参阅在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 规范。For more information about the <`SignedInfo`> element, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CanonicalizationMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CanonicalizationMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为当前 对象签名前使用的规范化算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the canonicalization algorithm that is used before signing for the current object.

value.span: 为当前 对象签名前使用的规范化算法。

span.span: The canonicalization algorithm used before signing for the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性使用统一资源标识符 (URI) 的字符串来表示 <`Canonicalization`> 元素的 XML 数字签名。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represent the <`Canonicalization`> element of an XML digital signature. 使用属性来指定应用于的 XML 输出的规范化算法类，然后执行签名计算。Use the property to specify the canonicalization algorithm applied to the XML output of the class before performing signature calculations. 使用此属性具有下表中列出的其中一个的 uri。Use one of the URIs listed in the following table with this property. |规范化方法Canonicalization Method|“值”Value| |-----------------------------|-----------| |规范化 XMLCanonical XML|http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315

这是默认方法。This is default method. 此外定义了以下静态字段中： Also defined in the following static field: | |规范化 XML 注释Canonical XML with comments|http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315#WithComments

此外定义了以下静态字段中： Also defined in the following static field: | |独占规范化 XMLExclusive Canonical XML|http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#

此外定义了以下静态字段中： Also defined in the following static field: | |独占规范化 XML 注释Exclusive Canonical XML with comments|http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#WithComments

此外定义了以下静态字段中： Also defined in the following static field: | 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 的 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 规范。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanonicalizationMethodObject As Transform

summary.span: 获取用于规范化的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object used for canonicalization.

value.span: 用于规范化的 对象。

span.span: A object used for canonicalization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含对象，由类来规范化 XML 文档，再进行签名或验证。The property contains the object used by the class to canonicalize an XML document before signing or verifying. 属性为只读。The property is read-only. 您可以修改通过所需的转换到的统一资源标识符 (URI) 的传入此属性中对象属性。You can modify the object within this property by passing the desired transform Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the property.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property References As ArrayList
public: property System::Collections::ArrayList ^ References { System::Collections::ArrayList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的 对象列表。

span.span: Gets a list of the objects of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的 元素列表。

span.span: A list of the elements of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用一系列对象来表示``XML 数字签名的元素。The property uses a list of objects to represent the `` elements of an XML digital signature. 使用属性来描述转换，摘要算法，和摘要值的 XML 数字签名。Use the property to describe the transforms, digest algorithms, and digest values of an XML digital signature. 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 的 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 规范。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

value.span: 当前 对象的签名长度。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SignatureMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SignatureMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于当前 对象的签名生成和验证的算法名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

value.span: 算法名称，用于当前 对象的签名生成和验证。

span.span: The name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性使用字符串统一资源标识符 (URI) 来表示``元素的 XML 数字签名。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represents the `` element of an XML digital signature. 使用属性来指定要用于签名生成和验证使用的算法。Use the property to specify the algorithm to use for signature generation and verification. 此属性标识在创建 XML 数字签名，包括哈希，公共密钥算法、 消息身份验证代码 (Mac)，并填充时涉及的所有加密功能。This property identifies all cryptographic functions involved in creating an XML digital signature, including hashing, public key algorithms, Message Authentication Codes (MACs), and padding. 使用此属性具有下表中的 Uri 之一。Use one of the URIs in the following table with this property. |签名方法Signature Method|“值”Value| |----------------------|-----------| |HMAC-SHA1HMAC-SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#hmac-sha1

此外定义了以下静态字段中： Also defined in the following static field: | |DSA 使用 SHA1DSA with SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#dsa-sha1

此外定义了以下静态字段中： Also defined in the following static field: | |使用 SHA1 RSARSA with SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1

此外定义了以下静态字段中： Also defined in the following static field: | 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) [XML 签名语法和处理规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).
